itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollway give their thoughts on John Kerry getting caught without a mask on a commercial flight -- plus Ross and Dan break down how the Washington Post lied about what Donald Trump asked Georgia officials to do after the election, C...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollway give their thoughts on John Kerry getting caught without a mask on a commercial flight -- plus Ross and Dan break down how the Washington Post lied about what Donald Trump asked Georgia officials to do after the election, Columbia University's segregated graduations, the Kentucky law that makes it illegal to make fun of cops, and the California law that would make it illegal to be a cop if you ever used hate speech.
